document_data.name: Fimbrul
document_data.caption: ''Map of Fimbrul.''
document_data.mainbody: '''Fimbrul''', also known as the '''Land of [[Giant]]s''', was a small nation of giants located amid the northern [[Howling Mountains]] in [[Laerakond]]. Fimbrul was known for its few landmarks and the small communities hidden in the snowy mountains.
document_data.Government: [[Darrawn]] was the only proper Fimbran city, the rest of the settlements being small trade moots or strongholds not acknowledged by the giants. Because of that, every settlement was self-sufficient and ruled itself.

Geography.Locations:
* '''[[Blackhold]]'''—The neutral trade moot of Fimbrul.
* '''[[Court of Rorn]]'''—The cave system where slept the [[Dawn Titan]] known as [[Rorn|Blazing Rorn the Fury]].
*'''Darrawn'''—The only Fimbran city and capital of the giant nation.
* '''[[Dragonbones]]'''—A seemingly bottomless chasm where all dragons in Laerakond went to die.
* '''[[Forgefires]]'''—A small community of xenophobic dwarves.
* '''[[Glaedorn]]'''—A cave full of [[gem]]stones and other precious ores.
* '''[[Rimlost]]'''—A tower where the followers of the Dawn Titans congregated.

document_data.History:
After the [[War of Fang and Talon]], most of the surviving [[primordial]]s of [[Abeir]] went to the Howling Mountains to hide from the wrath of their dragon steeds, and eventually entered into a coma-like sleep. Most of those primordials, such as Blazing Rorn the Fury or [[Cirotralech]], went to hide in the mountains that eventually will become part of Fimbrul.{{Cite organized play/LFR/Stir Not the World's Doom|26}}

In [[1469 DR]], a group of [[oni]] appeared in Fimbrul and organized the usually scattered Fimbran [[orc]] tribes into formidable war bands. The oni then led them against the Fimbran giants.
